name: 莊嶸騰
objective:
本課程為學生提供衛星通訊系統全面的技術知識與應用實務，包括衛星通訊基礎、衛星軌道配置、系統組件，以及衛星通訊信號處理等關鍵技術。學生將通過本課程學習到衛星通訊的理論基礎、系統設計、操作技術及其在各行各業的實際應用。
This course provides students with comprehensive technical knowledge and practical applications of satellite communication systems, including the basics of satellite communication, satellite orbital configuration, system components, and key technologies such as satellite communication signal processing. Through this course, students will learn the theoretical foundations of satellite communication, system design, operational techniques, and their practical applications across various industries.
schedule:
Week 1: Course Introduction and Overview of Satellite Communications
Week 2: History and Development of Satellite Communications
Week 3: Types and Functions of Satellites
Week 4: Fundamentals of Satellite Orbits
Week 5: Satellite Orbit Configuration and Management
Week 6: Components of Satellite Communication Systems (Part I)
Week 7: Components of Satellite Communication Systems (Part II)
Week 8: Satellite Signal Processing Technologies
Week 9: Midterm Report
Week 10: Satellite Communication Network Design
Week 11: Routing and Transmission Protocols in Satellite Communications
Week 12: Maintenance and Management of Satellite Systems
Week 13: Modern Applications of Satellite Communications
Week 14: Security and Encryption in Satellite Communications
Week 15: International Law and Policy in Satellite Communications
Week 16: Future Trends in Satellite Communication Technologies
Week 17: Course Review and Recap
Week 18: Final Report
scorePolicy:
Midterm Report (30%)
Final Report (30%)
Homework Assignments (20%)
Class Participation (20%)
